package de.codengine.tankerkoenig.client;

import java.util.Map;

import de.codengine.tankerkoenig.exception.ClientExecutorException;
import de.codengine.tankerkoenig.models.requests.Request;
import de.codengine.tankerkoenig.models.requests.Requester;

/**
 * Executes requests that are built from the {@link Requester} and originate
 * in the {@link Request}
 */
public interface ClientExecutor
{
   /**
    * Executes a GET request
    *
    * @param url             The request URL
    * @param queryParameters The query parameters
    * @return The response body
    * @throws ClientExecutorException Should be thrown if any parameter or client-side error occurs
    */
   String get(final String url, final Map<String, Object> queryParameters) throws ClientExecutorException;

   /**
    * Executes a POST request. Request Parameters should be sent as forms (not multipart)
    *
    * @param url        The request URL
    * @param formParams The form parameters
    * @return The response body
    * @throws ClientExecutorException Should be thrown if any parameter or client-side error occurs
    */
   String post(final String url, final Map<String, Object> formParams) throws ClientExecutorException;
}

# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration Summary

## Migration Completed Successfully ✓

The tankerkoenig-api-client project has been successfully migrated from Java 8 to Java 17.

## Changes Made

### 1. POM.xml Updates

#### Java Version Configuration
- Updated `maven.compiler.source` from 8 to 17
- Updated `maven.compiler.target` from 8 to 17
- Added `maven.compiler.release` set to 17

#### Dependency Version Updates
The following dependencies were updated to Java 17 compatible versions:

| Dependency | Old Version | New Version |
|------------|-------------|-------------|
| gson | 2.8.0 | 2.11.0 |
| okhttp | 3.8.0 | 4.12.0 |
| junit | 4.12 | 4.13.2 |
| assertj-core | 3.8.0 | 3.26.3 |
| mockito-core | 2.8.9 | 5.13.0 |
| equalsverifier | 2.3 | 3.17.3 |

#### Maven Plugin Updates

| Plugin | Old Version | New Version |
|--------|-------------|-------------|
| maven-compiler-plugin | 3.6.1 | 3.13.0 |
| jacoco-maven-plugin | 0.7.9 | 0.8.12 |
| maven-javadoc-plugin | 2.10.4 | 3.10.1 |
| maven-source-plugin | 3.0.1 | 3.3.1 |
| maven-gpg-plugin | 1.6 | 3.2.7 |

### 2. Source Code Changes

#### Test Code Modifications

1. **RequesterTest.java**
   - **Issue**: Mockito 5.x doesn't allow throwing `Throwable.class` for methods that don't declare it in their signature
   - **Fix**: Changed `when(clientExecutor.get(any(), any())).thenThrow(Throwable.class)` to `thenThrow(new Error("Test error"))`
   - **Line**: ~247
   - **Rationale**: Error is an unchecked Throwable that can be thrown without declaration, maintaining the original test intent

2. **OkHttp3ClientExecutorTest.java**
   - **Issue**: `new Integer(int)` constructor is deprecated and marked for removal in Java 17
   - **Fix**: Replaced `new Integer(5)` with `Integer.valueOf(5)` (2 occurrences)
   - **Lines**: ~80, ~139
   - **Rationale**: `Integer.valueOf()` is the recommended approach and uses caching for better performance

3. **PricesRequestTest.java**
   - **Issue**: `org.assertj.core.util.Lists` is deprecated in AssertJ 3.x
   - **Fix**: 
     - Removed import of `org.assertj.core.util.Lists`
     - Added imports for `java.util.Arrays` and `java.util.Collections`
     - Replaced `Lists.emptyList()` with `Collections.emptyList()`
     - Replaced `Lists.newArrayList(...)` with `Arrays.asList(...)`
   - **Line**: ~124, ~131
   - **Rationale**: Use standard Java collections API instead of deprecated test utilities

### 3. Javadoc Configuration
- Updated Javadoc link from `http://download.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/` to `https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/`

## Build Verification

✓ All 140 tests pass successfully
✓ Compilation completed without errors
✓ Bytecode compiled to Java 17 (major version 61)
✓ No critical warnings (only expected JaCoCo bootstrap classpath warning)

## Command to Verify

```bash
mvn clean verify
```

Expected result: BUILD SUCCESS with all 140 tests passing

## Compatibility Notes

1. **JaCoCo Warning**: The warning "Sharing is only supported for boot loader classes because bootstrap classpath has been appended" is expected when using JaCoCo with Java 17 and does not affect functionality.

2. **Mockito 5.x Changes**: The migration to Mockito 5.x includes stricter type checking for exception mocking, which required updating test code.

3. **AssertJ 3.x Changes**: The deprecated `Lists` utility class from AssertJ was replaced with standard Java collections.

4. **OkHttp 4.x**: The migration from OkHttp 3.x to 4.x is backward compatible for the use cases in this project.

## Migration Date
January 29, 2026

## Java Version
- Source: Java 17
- Target: Java 17
- Runtime: OpenJDK 17.0.17
